p:
The number of clinical trials to be conducted in sub‐Saharan Africa after the current COVID‐19 pandemic likely will grow exponentially. As of 2 nd of June 2020, eight countries – Gambia, Nigeria, Senegal, South Africa, Sudan and Zambia – in sub‐Saharan Africa had registered 53 COVID‐19‐related clinical trials of Bacille Calmette Guerin vaccine, chloroquine, hydroxychloroquine, antiretrovirals, and Remdesivir.
